entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
